import pandas as pd
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()

storage_account=mssparkutils.notebook.run('/utils/py_utils_get_storage_account')

absences_table_loc = "abfss://odw-standardised@" + storage_account+'HR/hr_absences_temp'

work_schedule = spark.read.format('delta').load("abfss://odw-standardised@" + storage_account+'HR/hr_work_schedule_rule').toPandas()
absences = spark.read.format('delta').load(absences_table_loc).toPandas()

def get_absence_hrs(id, days, start, end, ws):
    ws = work_schedule[work_schedule["work_schedule_rule"] == ws]
    sum = 0
    for d in pd.bdate_range(start, end):
        day_short_name = d.day_name()[0:2]
        hrs = float(ws[day_short_name.lower()])
        sum += days*hrs if  0 < days < 1 else hrs
    return str(sum)

for i, row in absences.iterrows():
    absences.at[i, 'hrs'] = get_absence_hrs(row['staff_number'], float(row['days']), row['start_date'], row['end_date'], row['work_schedule_rule'])

absencesDF = spark.createDataFrame(absences)
absencesDF.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(absences_table_loc)

%%sql   

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_absences

AS

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 5
        THEN CONCAT('00',Staff_Number)
        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 4
        THEN CONCAT('50',Staff_Number)        
        ELSE Staff_Number
    END as Staff_Number,
    Abs_Type,
    Sickness_Group,
    to_timestamp(Start_Date) AS Start_Date,
    to_timestamp(End_Date) AS End_Date,
    Attendance_or_Absence_Type,
    Days,
    Hrs,
    Start,
    End_time,
    Cal_days,
    Work_Schedule_Rule,
    Wk_Hrs,
    Hrs_Day,
    WkDys,
    to_timestamp(Annual_Leave_Start) AS Annual_Leave_Start, 
    ingested_datetime,
    expected_from,
    expected_to

FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_absences_temp T1
INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(expected_from) AS Max_expectedfrom FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_absences) MEF ON T1.expected_from = MEF.Max_expectedfrom

%%sql   

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_addresses

AS

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 5
        THEN CONCAT('00',Staff_Number)
        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 4
        THEN CONCAT('50',Staff_Number)        
        ELSE Staff_Number
    END as Staff_Number,
    Street_and_House_Number,
    `2nd_Address_Line`,
    City,
    District,
    Postal_Code,
    Region_State_Province_Count,
    to_timestamp(Start_Date) AS Start_Date,
    to_timestamp(End_Date) AS End_Date,
    Charting_Officer,
    Charting_Officer_for_Inspector,
    Subs_PS_Group,
    Tel_No,
    Personal_Mobile,
    Work_Mobile,
    to_timestamp(Chngd_on) AS Chngd_on,
    ingested_datetime,
    expected_from,
    expected_to

FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_addresses T1
INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(expected_from) AS Max_expectedfrom FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_addresses) MEF ON T1.expected_from = MEF.Max_expectedfrom

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_email

        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 4

    ingested_datetime,

FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_email T1

%%sql   

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_leave

AS

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 5
        THEN CONCAT('00',Staff_Number)
        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 4
        THEN CONCAT('50',Staff_Number)        
        ELSE Staff_Number
    END as Staff_Number,
    number,
    deduction,
    to_timestamp(ded_from) AS ded_from,
    to_timestamp(ded_to) AS ded_to,
    absence_quota_type,
    ingested_datetime,
    expected_from,
    expected_to

FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_leave T1
INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(expected_from) AS Max_expectedfrom FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_leave) MEF ON T1.expected_from = MEF.Max_expectedfrom

%%sql   

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_leavers

AS

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN LENGTH(Pers_No) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Pers_No,1,1) = 5
        THEN CONCAT('00',Pers_No)
        WHEN LENGTH(Pers_No) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Pers_No,1,1) = 4
        THEN CONCAT('50',Pers_No)        
        ELSE Pers_No
    END as Pers_No,
    Last_name,
    First_name,
    CoCd,
    Company_Code,
    Loc,
    Location,
    PS_group,
    Pay_Band_Description,
    Org_unit,
    Organizational_Unit,
    PA,
    Personnel_Area,
    Personnel_Subarea,
    WorkC,
    Work_Contract,
    to_timestamp(Org_Start_Date) AS Org_Start_Date,
    Leaving,
    Act,
    Action_Type,
    ActR,
    Reason_for_Action,
    S,
    Employment_Status,
    Employee_No,
    Position,
    Position_1,
    Annual_salary,
    Curr,
    User_ID,
    Email_Address,
    Pers_No_1,
    Name_of_Manager_OM,
    Manager_Position,
    MAnager_Position_Text,
    LM_E_mail,
    ingested_datetime,
    expected_from,
    expected_to

FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_leavers T1
INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(expected_from) AS Max_expectedfrom FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_leavers) MEF ON T1.expected_from = MEF.Max_expectedfrom

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_protected_characteristics

AS

SELECT 
    ref_no,
    ethnic_origin,
    religious_denomination_key,
    sxo,
    disability_text,
    disability_code_description,
    disabled,
    ethnicity,
    religion,
    sexual_orientation,
    grade
    ingested_datetime,
    expected_from,
    expected_to

FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_protected_characteristics T1
INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(expected_from) AS Max_expectedfrom FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_protected_characteristics) MEF ON T1.expected_from = MEF.Max_expectedfrom

%%sql   

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr

AS

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN LENGTH(Pers_No) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Pers_No,1,1) = 5
        THEN CONCAT('00',Pers_No)
        WHEN LENGTH(Pers_No) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Pers_No,1,1) = 4
        THEN CONCAT('50',Pers_No)        
        ELSE Pers_No
    END as Pers_No,
    First_name,
    Last_name,
    Employee_No,
    CoCd,
    Company_Code,
    PA,
    Personnel_Area,
    PSubarea,
    Personnel_Subarea,
    Org_Unit,
    Organizational_Unit,
    Organizational_key1,
    Organizational_key2,
    WorkC,
    Work_Contract,
    CT,
    Contract_Type,
    PS_Group,
    Pay_Band_Description,
    FTE,
    Wk_hrs,
    Indicator_Part_Time_Employee,
    S,
    Employment_Status,
    Gender_Key,
    to_timestamp(TRA_Start_Date) AS TRA_Start_Date,
    to_timestamp(TRA_End_Date) AS TRA_End_Date,
    TRA_Status,
    TRA_Grade,
    Prev_PersNo,
    ActR,
    Reason_for_Action,
    Position,
    Position_1,
    Cost_Ctr,
    Cost_Centre,
    to_timestamp(Civil_Service_Start) AS Civil_Service_Start,
    to_timestamp(Date_to_Current_Job) AS Date_to_Current_Job,
    to_timestamp(Seniority_Date) AS Seniority_Date,
    to_timestamp(Date_to_Subst_Grade) AS Date_to_Subst_Grade,
    Pers_No_1,
    Name_of_Manager_OM,
    Manager_Position,
    Manager_Position_Text,
    Counter_Sign_Manager,
    Loc,
    Location,
    to_timestamp(Org_Start_Date) AS Org_Start_Date,
    to_timestamp(Fix_Term_End_Date) AS Fix_Term_End_Date,
    to_timestamp(Loan_Start_Date) AS Loan_Start_Date,
    to_timestamp(Loan_End_Date) AS Loan_End_Date,
    EEGrp,
    Employee_Group,
    Annual_salary,
    Curr,
    NI_number,
    Birth_date,
    Age_of_employee,
    EO,
    Ethnic_origin,
    NID,
    Rel,
    Religious_Denomination_Key,
    SxO,
    Wage_Type,
    Employee_Subgroup,
    LOA_Abs_Type,
    LOA_Absence_Type_Text,
    Scheme_reference,
    Pension_Scheme_Name,
    Disability_Code,
    Disability_Text,
    Disability_Code_Description,
    PArea,
    Payroll_Area,
    Assignment_Number,
    FTE_2,
    ingested_datetime,
    expected_from,
    expected_to

FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_saphr T1
INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(expected_from) AS Max_expectedfrom FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_saphr) MEF ON T1.expected_from = MEF.Max_expectedfrom

%%sql   

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_specialisms

AS

        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 5
        THEN CONCAT('00',Staff_Number)
        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 4
